EmailTemplate.description: For Jeremy Kirkland only. Use this email if they are not interested at this time.
EmailTemplate.name: Flex to AJ Email 3- Jeremy Kirkland
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for connecting with me.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Good day,
Thank you for taking the time today to talk. I am glad we could connect.
While the Platinum Purchasing program may not be the right fit for you at this time, Office Depot is always here as a resource for all your business needs. Should you decide to consider this program again, please feel free to contact me.
I will follow up with you at a later date to see if your office supply needs have changed.
Thank you.
Jeremy Kirkland Senior Account Manager Office DEPOT | Business Solutions Division jeremy.kirkland@officedepot.com 855.337.6811 x 2897
Office Depot® is a trademark of The Office Club, Inc. OfficeMax® is a trademark of OMX, Inc. © 2017 Office Depot, Inc. To ensure delivery to your inbox, please add officedepot@e.business.officedepot.com to your safe sender list or address book. Privacy Policy
